title: Arnhem, Satire, Bartending and Drums
itunes:title: Arnhem, Satire, Bartending and Drums
itunes:subtitle: Comedian, historian, broadcaster Al Murray joins me on the podcast to discuss Arnhem. The British-Polish allied defeat at Arnhem took place in autumn 1944, 76 years ago this week.
description:
Comedian, historian, broadcaster Al Murray joins me on the podcast to discuss Arnhem. The British-Polish allied defeat at Arnhem took place in autumn 1944, 76 years ago this week.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
